sentence:
Ms. LEE of Nevada. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the  tremendous achievement of eleven young men from Troop 407 in Las Vegas  who will receive their Eagle Scout Awards simultaneously on December 6,  2025. This event marks only the second time nationally, and the first  in Las Vegas, that a troop has achieved such a feat.
